channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report E-2023090345
item.description:
Report E-2023090345

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: SCOTT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that one of the 250 gallon poly totes of setting aid (un1993) was defective and had cracked and had released 2 ounce of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report I-2023080077
item.description:
Report I-2023080077

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: Bossier City
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: At 18:45 While loading a shipment in behind a tote the forklift blades were hanging out the back side of the palllet and puntured the tote. The tote was manuvered to stop the leak, hazmat one was called in for the clean up and to make all the necessary calls and were finished at 01:30 am

item.title: Report X-2023081232
item.description:
Report X-2023081232

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: SAINT ROSE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was loaded on the truck to go out for delivery when a small wet spot on the package was found. Package was then placed in a hazmat bin then went into the hazmat cage. DescribePack: Upon inspection a loose cap on 1 of the 4 bottles was found causing minor leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a hazmat bin to help mitigate the effects of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023081231
item.description:
Report X-2023081231

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: SAINT ROSE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being offloaded from the trailer a strong smell was coming from the hazmat, QA was called and immediately brought the package to the hazmat cage for further inspection. DescribePack: Once the package was in the QA cage, the cap on the package was found loose and small particles did escape. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a hazmat bin to be separated from all other packages.

item.title: Report I-2023080037
item.description:
Report I-2023080037

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T03:11:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: Abbeville
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: At 14:30 on 07/18/2023 driver proceeded to drive a half mile to next stop. The dock was on a decline he got in the trailer and the poly drums had turned over and 1 was Ieaking. He manuevered the drun to quit Ieaking and called safety. At 14:35 Hazmat one was called and clean up crew was dispatched. The spill was cleaned and disposed of by 18:33
